name: prologue
description: 50 years have passed since the battle in the sky, the great calamity that was brought forward by the violet of The Enemy. The heroes of Kalkatesh fought against this great threat and for a time the world was at peace. 50 years is long to some, but to others not long enough as the world has only just begun to heal. And as such, our story begins on the eastern continent of Glies - new opportunity and new adventure awaits.
